arts.ttl: Juve determined to stay in pole position vs Genoa
arts.sum: Patrick Vieira and Igor Tudor face off for the second time after Juventus beat Genoa 1-0 last March in Serie A. Genoa and Juventus to face off in Marassi on Matchday 2 of Serie A 2025-26

arts.ttl: Genoa vs Juventus – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Genoa and Juventus go head-to-head in Serie A on Sunday. Both sides will be looking to build on their opening round results, as the Rossoblu search for their first goal of the season while the Bianconeri aim to maintain their winning momentum. Genoa vs Juventus – Match Preview and Team News Date: Sunday, 31st August. Kick-off: 5:30pm […] The post Genoa vs Juventus – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Juventus XI vs Genoa – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Juventus make the trip to the Luigi Ferraris Stadium to face Genoa on Sunday in their second Serie A fixture of the season. The Bianconeri travel to Liguria after a convincing 2-0 home victory over Parma in their opening match, with goals from Jonathan David and Dusan Vlahovic sealing a win in their first fixture […] The post Juventus XI vs Genoa – Predicted lineup and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.
